caption.title: Phylogenetic trees of HA1, NP and M sequences for EIV (black) and CIV (colors).
caption.p: Boxes surround CIV clades comprising two or more samples from the same US state. Branches leading to CIV samples from the same location are colored by location (New York, blue; Pennsylvania, orange; Colorado, purple. Branches leading to CIV samples from multiple locations are colored grey.
